Posts.Content:
I'm 25 and don't really have a strong history of breast cancer in my family. Although about
 2 months ago a lump popped up in my right breast. It's VERY painful around my time of the month and usually tender any other time. It's a pretty large lump and I can see the swelling around menstruation. I'm very nervous and not sure I want to see the doctor. I've made an appointment 3 times and can't seem to drag myself. Maybe I'm
Being hypochondriact?
Posts.Title: 25 with a painful lump. I'm nervous!

Posts.Content: I'm glad to hear I'm not alone. I haven't seen a doctor yet though. I'm too nervous. I have a huge lump in my right breast and it's always tender but very painful around my "time" i can see the swelling when I am having my "time" I just don't know what to do. If there is nothing they can do what's the point of going to the doctor?
Posts.Title: 25 Years old - Family HX of breast and ovarian CA - Dr. found lump, does not show up on ultrasound
